text: The 2017 PDC Players Championship 9 was the ninth of twenty-two Players Championship events on the 2017 PDC Pro Tour. The tournament took place in Wigan, England on 29 April. It featured a field of 128 players and £75,000 in prize money, with £10,000 going to the winner. == Seeds == == Results == ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 5==== ====Section 6==== ====Section 7==== ====Section 8==== == References == Category:2017 PDC Pro Tour
